description: Borrowed from Latin trochlea (“case or sheaf containing one or more pulleys, block”).

definitionGroups.group: (anatomy) A structure resembling or acting like a pulley.

entries.meaning: In the elbow joint, the articular surface of the lower extremity of the humerus, grasped by the trochlear notch of the ulna.
A pulley-like cartilage through which the superior oblique muscle of the eyeball passes.
